main.name: Yan-Ru Jhou
description: Seeking for Software Development Intern for 2020 summer
Software engineering experience in web development
Cloud Service experience as intern in Chunghwa Telecom Laboratories, the largest telecom in Taiwan
A graduate student in Computer Science in UCLA for 2019 fall
main.bio: I received my Computer Science Bachelor Degree in National Tsing-Hua University,(NTHU). My goal is to be a multi-disciplined expert. Extensive learning in engineering, management, research, leadership, and problem solving. My engineering forte is software engineering, development process, and quality assurance. Expert at analyzing and solving the most complex problems. Self-motivated, professional and capable of working independently or as part of a team.

testimonials.text: There is no single development, in either technology or management technique, which by itself promises even one order of magnitude improvement within a decade in productivity, in reliability, in simplicity.
